ui.error_rtf: Please select an RTF file first.
ui.error_img: Please select an image directory first.
ui.error_both: Please select both an RTF file and an image directory.
ui.error_not_rtf: The selected file must be an RTF file (.rtf extension).

help.rtf_text: This is the RTF file exported from Football Manager containing the list of players (newgens). To export it: In FM, go to a player list view, select all players, right-click and choose 'Export to Web Page'.
help.img_text: This is the folder containing the face images sorted by ethnicity. Each subfolder should be named after an ethnicity (e.g., African, Asian, Caucasian) and contain PNG face images.

mode.generate_desc: Generate new face mappings for all players without existing faces.
mode.preserve_desc: Keep existing face mappings and only assign faces to new players.
mode.overwrite_desc: Replace ALL existing face mappings with new ones.
